article.contentHtml:
Try this easy-to-make Nail Art with the new colorsÂ PassioneOngles.

Products used:

  • Master Natural
  • VS448 Poppins
  • VS134 White Extra
  • Master Gloss

How to make it:

  • Perform your reconstruction with the Master Natural and define the shape of your nail
  • Draw waves with the VS448 Poppins and cure 30''
  • Fill in the empty spaces of your design by drawing wavy lines with VS134 White Extra and cure 30''
  • Seals with Master Gloss and cures 30''
article.title: Glitter waves
article.content: Try this easy-to-make Nail Art with the new colors PassioneOngles.Products used: Master Natural VS448 Poppins VS134 White Extra Master Gloss How to make it: Perform your reconstruction with the Master Natural and define the shape of your nail Draw waves with the VS448 Poppins and cure 30'' Fill in the empty spaces of your design by drawing wavy lines with VS134 White Extra and cure 30'' Seals with Master Gloss and cures 30''
